title: Saving Halloween
description: 2012 Kay Snow Award Winner2013 B.R.A.G. Medallion(TM) Honoree2012 Amazon BestsellerWhen book-smart Anne Parson meets Halloween Spavento, she sees exactly what she wants to see -- a friend. Halloween waves away trouble, magically silences school bullies and offers Anne unfailing friendship. But, when the Spavento family's enchanting exploits are exposed, will Anne face her fears and save Halloween?A spellbinding tale of outcasts who find acceptance, a girl who discovers the true meaning of family, and characters who are not always what they seem.
author: Lisa Ard
